duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed daily sales goals and provide exceptional customer consultations and product demonstrations.
Educate customers on brand values and articulate them through community engagement.
Continually expand product knowledge and make informed product recommendations for customers' needs.
Support the growth of the team and actively seek feedback to improve performance.
Maintain a clean and organized store and practice company standards for a respectful workplace.

education_certification.credential: Excellent customer service skills and flexibility to adapt to changing situations and priorities in a fast-paced environment.
